definition: to press/to squeeze/to extract juice, oil etc by squeezing
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to press/to extract (juice)/device for extracting juice, oils etc

sentences.english: Joe Oramas: How can you not have a garlic press?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼可能沒有一個大蒜壓榨機呢？

sentences.english: He also insisted United would not fleece fans despite the demand for season tickets.
sentences.chinese: 他還強調雖然季票很搶手，但是球隊不會壓榨球迷。

sentences.english: Never had such pincers seized him hitherto.
sentences.chinese: 他從來還沒有遇到過這種夾棍的壓榨。

sentences.english: After the agaves are crushed at the distillery, why are they loaded into a hornos?
sentences.chinese: 當龍舌蘭在酒廠被壓榨後，爲什麼要被放進烤爐中呢？

sentences.english: Strangles the soul of a target enemy unit and extracts bits and pieces of it.
sentences.chinese: 勒緊一個敵方單位的靈魂，將他壓榨出來。

sentences.english: The permeability experiments of sesame cake and peanut cake were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 進行了芝麻與花生餅植物油料的壓榨滲透率試驗。

sentences.english: In 1828 Van Houten developed the cocoa press.
sentences.chinese: 1828年，凡豪坦開發了可可壓榨機。

sentences.english: Such a move would invariably squeeze large landholders, corporations in the main.
sentences.chinese: 此類舉動必將壓榨大地主，大公司。

sentences.english: The sludge dewatering performance of screw press dehydrator was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了螺旋壓榨式脫水機對污泥的脫水性能。

sentences.english: They're going to have to stop penalizing households.
sentences.chinese: 不要再壓榨普通家庭了。

sentences.english: It's fundamental. Real disposable income has been squeezed.
sentences.chinese: 這是基本性的，可用實際收入已經被壓榨了。

sentences.english: The press rolls on paper machine belong to hollow casting roll.
sentences.chinese: 造紙機壓榨輥屬空心鑄造輥。

sentences.english: He poured water on it, Then he squeezed the sponge.
sentences.chinese: 他倒水在上面然後壓榨那塊海綿。

sentences.english: I know businessmen who have been squeezed this way.
sentences.chinese: 我就認識很多這樣被壓榨的商人。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of expression on the quality of decoction of traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究中藥的壓榨處理對湯劑質量的影響。

definition: rice bowl/fig. livelihood/job/way of making a living
many and complicated/mired in minor details
ground or first floor/bottom (of a pile)/lowest rung (of society)
